body:
Day 70 - 1728*
Back to the gay shit. Also, isn't the author getting lazy with the names? We had one named Liquid Love and now it's Liquid Passion. Not only that but the characters appearance seems to change every panel. Sometimes I questioned myself about who was fucking and who was getting fucked.
1/10.
f you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
